sourcesContent:
<template>
	<gmap-map
		:center="center"
		:zoom="9"
	>

        <GmapMarker
            :key="marker"
            v-for="(m, marker) in markers"
            :position="m"
            :clickable="true"
            :draggable="false"
            @click="onMarkerClick(m)"
        />

        <gmap-info-window :options="infoOptions" :position="infoWindowPos" :opened="infoWinOpen" @closeclick="infoWinOpen=false">
            {{infoContent}}
        </gmap-info-window>

	</gmap-map>
</template>

<script>
    import { db } from '../main'

	export default {
	    data () {
	        return {
                center: { lat: 45.508, lng: -73.587 },
                markers: [],
                infoContent: '',
                infoWindowPos: null,
                infoWinOpen: false,
                currentMidx: null,
                infoOptions: {
                    pixelOffset: {
                        width: 0,
                        height: -35
                    }
                },
	        }
        },
        firestore (){
            return{
                markers: db.collection('markers')
            }
        },
        mounted() {
            this.geolocate();
        },
	    methods: {
            onMarkerClick (marker) {
                this.infoWindowPos = marker;
                this.infoContent = 'Cisterna ' + marker.id;
                //this.infoContent = marker.infoText;

                if (this.currentMidx == marker.id && this.infoWinOpen == true) {
                    this.$router.push({ name: 'graficos',params:{Pid:marker.id} })
                }
                else {
                    this.infoWinOpen = true;
                    this.currentMidx = marker.id;

                }
            },
            geolocate: function() {
                navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(position => {
                    this.center = {
                        lat: position.coords.latitude,
                        lng: position.coords.longitude
                    };
                });
            }
        }
	}
</script>

<style>
    .vue-map-container {
        width:100%;
        height: 100%;
        min-height: 200px;
        display: block;
    }
</style>
